Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job

Interface WorkUnit

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWorkUnit, Job, Reservation
public interface WorkUnit
Interface that exposes features of jobs and tasks.
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

    Possible task/job statuses.

    • getOwnerEntityId

      int getOwnerEntityId()
      Returns the id of the owner (or user) of the job.
      Returns:
      the id of the owner or -1 if not found

    • setStatus

      boolean setStatus(WorkUnit.Status status, long time)
      Sets the status of this task.
      Parameters:
      status - the status of this task
      time - simulation time at which the status is to be set
      Returns:
      true if the status has been set; false otherwise.

    • setSubmitTime

      void setSubmitTime(long time)
      Sets the submission time.
      Parameters:
      time - the submission time
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if time < 0
